data.title: Cloud and Digital Acceleration Drive Microsoft Earnings
data.text: Microsoft (MSFT) is increasingly looking to cloud services, productivity, and gaming as its future engine of growth.

data.title: Microsoft: A Strong Start to Fiscal 2021
data.text: Microsoft (NASDAQ:MSFT) reported financial results for its first quarter of fiscal 2021 on Tuesday.

data.title: Microsoft reports strong growth for LinkedIn and cloud platform Azure in Q3 2020
data.text: Spotlighting its focus on digital transformation, Microsoft announced strong Q3 2020 earlier this week. The tech giant's diversified portfolio of products and services for marketers and businesses fueled its 12% revenue increase this quarter.

data.title: Where Will Microsoft Be in 5 Years?
data.text: The tech giant's business will continue to evolve as it turns its core products into cloud-based services.
